name: ミンク
message: "Hey! Over here!"
Mink leaps into the open and shouts at the top of his lungs, drawing the attention of the cops.
What the hell is he thinking?! He's gonna get shot!

name: ミンクチームＡ
message: "Alright, let's do this!"
I hear the sound of something hitting the ground, then the room is filled with white clouds once again.
This time, the clouds are much thicker. I can't see anything at all.

name: 蒼葉
message: "What... Gah, cough!"
I take a breath and immediately start coughing. Is this... flour?

name: 悪島
message: "Ugh! Gah! Hack! Wh-What the hell?! Flour?!"

name: 警官Ｃ
message: "Shit! Shoot! Shoot them!"

name: 悪島
message: "No, you fucking morons! Are you trying to kill me?! Hold your fire!!!"

name: 悪島
message: "If a spark catches on that shit, we're fucked!"

name: ミンク
message: "Now!"
Mink shouts to me, pointing at the disoriented cops.
I don't want to use my power if I can avoid it.
But right now, it's my only hope of escaping without hurting anyone.
I put the megaphone to my mouth and close my eyes.
I try to shut out the noise around me and focus on the sound of my heartbeat.
...I need to do my part.
I focus my will into my voice...

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Stop!"

name: 警官Ｂ
message: "Guh... Ugh...!"

name: ミンクチームＡ
message: "Ahhh, ahhhhh!"

name: 悪島
message: "Wh-What... My head...!"
...Did it work?
The gunshots have stopped, but now all I hear are groans of pain.
Little by little, the white haze clears.
And what I see... freezes my blood.
Everyone, including Mink's men... is writhing on the floor.
No...
This isn't a success.
...This is a failure. I failed.

name: ミンク
message: "Let's go."
Mink grabs me by the arm.

name: 蒼葉
message: "But your guys...!"

name: ミンク
message: "More cops are coming. Just run."
Mink yanks on my arm and we start running.
I hear footsteps running toward us from the other direction.
My head is pounding, as if to torment me.
My attempt to use Scrap was a disaster. Mink's men were caught in it too.
I'm sure that my lack of focus was the problem. I failed to control the power.
An intense wave of self-loathing hits me.
But it's too late for regret.
I know that! I know...!
We escape from the warehouse and head back to Glitter.
